__e: All I do is cook and do laundry.
Well I'd like to clean my apartment. Do a little laundry, maybe. And take some flying lessons.
You're out all day. She can clean, cook.
I can see her now, carrying the laundry home on her head.
Well, I had a mind to stay in bed this morning... but there was the washing to do, so I says to meself, I says:
I figured when she'd passed on there'd be some laundry to do and a fare-thee-well.
